name: Modded Lego Tutorial
description:
Title: Modded Lego Tutorial

Platform: PC Game 

Genre: Platformer 

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: A modded version of the Lego Microgame Tutorial on Unity, now with more obstacles and expands upon the current level. Traverse through the lego landscape and collect all the trophies to save LegoLand.

Instructions: 

WASD - Movement Keys

Tab - Pause

Space - Jump (you can jump in the air!)

Game Design Team 

Thomas Nguyen – Game Designer
